quote: Civilization began the first time an angry person cast a word instead of a rock.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
name: Henry Ford

quote: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
name: Ausonius

quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
name: Confucius

quote: The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
name: Warren Buffett

quote: And know that I am with you always; yes, to the end of time.
name: Jesus Christ

quote: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Let your life lightly dance on the edges of Time like dew on the tip of a leaf.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: I believe that whatever comes at a particular time is a blessing from God.
name: A. R. Rahman

quote: My dream is of a place and a time where America will once again be seen as the last best hope of earth.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Together we can change the world, just one random act of kindness at a time.
name: Ron Hall

quote: Patriotism is supporting your country all the time, and your government when it deserves it.
name: Mark Twain

quote: What you feel inside reflects on your face. So be happy and positive all the time.
name: Sridevi

quote: Yesterday's the past, tomorrow's the future, but today is a gift. That's why it's called the present.
name: Bil Keane

quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
name: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Truth is like the sun. You can shut it out for a time, but it ain't goin' away.
name: Elvis Presley

quote: The butterfly counts not months but moments, and has time enough.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Life is all about having a good time.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: In seed time learn, in harvest teach, in winter enjoy.
name: William Blake

quote: Evening is a time of real experimentation. You never want to look the same way.
name: Donna Karan

quote: Time spent with cats is never wasted.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Tea time is a chance to slow down, pull back and appreciate our surroundings.
name: Letitia Baldrige

quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
name: Mark Twain

quote: I am grateful for all the moments that I have, and I'm moving forward one step at a time to the future.
name: Park Bo-gum

quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
name: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: Christmas, my child, is love in action. Every time we love, every time we give, it's Christmas.
name: Dale Evans

quote: Jealousy is just love and hate at the same time.
name: Drake

quote: It takes discipline not to let social media steal your time.
name: Alexis Ohanian

quote: If biking is your passion, set aside time to enjoy a good ride.
name: Patrick Dempsey

quote: Time is more value than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: I don't want to miss out on the chance of having a good time.
name: Victor Webster

quote: People won't have time for you if you are always angry or complaining.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: I don't think quantity time is as special as quality time with your family.
name: Reba McEntire

quote: Christmas is the day that holds all time together.
name: Alexander Smith

quote: Everything is a learning process: any time you fall over, it's just teaching you to stand up the next time.
name: Joel Edgerton

quote: It's pretty scary to know how quickly time flies.
name: James Wan

quote: Anyone can be heroic from time to time, but a gentleman is something you have to be all the time.
name: Luigi Pirandello

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: It's crazy how fast time flies and how things progress.
name: Nathan Chen

quote: Ocean is more ancient than the mountains, and freighted with the memories and the dreams of Time.
name: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
name: Bruce Lee

quote: But a city is more than a place in space, it is a drama in time.
name: Patrick Geddes

quote: It takes a long time to become young.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: The jealous are possessed by a mad devil and a dull spirit at the same time.
name: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quote: No matter how busy you are, you must take time to make the other person feel important.
name: Mary Kay Ash

quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity.
name: Hippocrates

quote: The tree of liberty must be refreshed from time to time with the blood of patriots and tyrants.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
name: Charles Darwin

quote: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: I think every girl's dream is to find a bad boy at the right time, when he wants to not be bad anymore.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: Peace is a journey of a thousand miles and it must be taken one step at a time.
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: I absolutely love spending time with my family.
name: Kevin Alejandro

quote: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: Only the guy who isn't rowing has time to rock the boat.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: I regret those times when I've chosen the dark side. I've wasted enough time not being happy.
name: Jessica Lange

quote: I don't have time for hobbies. At the end of the day, I treat my job as a hobby. It's something I love doing.
name: David Beckham

quote: Spending time outdoors makes you feel great.
name: Elizabeth Hurley

quote: Everywhere is within walking distance if you have the time.
name: Steven Wright

quote: An intelligent man is sometimes forced to be drunk to spend time with his fools.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Take time to be kind and to say 'thank you.'
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: I'm just here for good times, man. I want people to have the best time ever. Especially if they're around me.
name: Travis Scott

quote: I think, every time I'm on the mountain, I'm just so thankful to be there.
name: Chloe Kim

quote: The time is always right to do what is right.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Architecture should speak of its time and place, but yearn for timelessness.
name: Frank Gehry

quote: Don't limit a child to your own learning, for he was born in another time.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: We all need to make time for a burger once in a while.
name: Erica Durance

quote: Actually, my dog I think is the only person who consistently loves me all the time.
name: H. G. Bissinger

quote: Christmas and the holidays are the season of giving. It's a time when people are more kind and open-hearted.
name: Gisele Bundchen

quote: Prejudice is a great time saver. You can form opinions without having to get the facts.
name: E. B. White

quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
name: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: Don't worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Australia.
name: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Time moves in one direction, memory in another.
name: William Gibson

quote: Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at the right time.
name: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Saying goodbye doesn't mean anything. It's the time we spent together that matters, not how we left it.
name: Trey Parker

quote: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Silence is as deep as eternity, speech a shallow as time.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: The time to relax is when you don't have time for it.
name: Sydney J. Harris

quote: Every time you tear a leaf off a calendar, you present a new place for new ideas and progress.
name: Charles Kettering

quote: If you're not having a good time, find something else that gives you some joy in life.
name: Penny Marshall

quote: Comedy is tragedy - plus time.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: Christmas makes me happy no matter what time of year it comes around.
name: Bryan White

quote: Thanksgiving is a time of togetherness and gratitude.
name: Nigel Hamilton

quote: Video games are a waste of time for men with nothing else to do. Real brains don't do that.
name: Ray Bradbury

quote: There is a saying that every nice piece of work needs the right person in the right place at the right time.
name: Benoit Mandelbrot

quote: The airplane stays up because it doesn't have the time to fall.
name: Orville Wright

quote: The industrial revolution allowed us, for the first time, to start replacing human labour with machines.
name: Vitalik Buterin

quote: Photography is my passion. Whenever I get time, I click.
name: Shaheer Sheikh

quote: History is a cyclic poem written by time upon the memories of man.
name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: Time goes by so slowly when you're a child, and then, as an adult, it goes by in the blink of an eye.
name: David Lowery

quote: Time and memory are true artists; they remould reality nearer to the heart's desire.
name: John Dewey

quote: It's time for the human race to enter the solar system.
name: Dan Quayle

quote: In a time of universal deceit - telling the truth is a revolutionary act.
name: Unknown

quote: I was not a good student. I did not spend much time at college; I was too busy enjoying myself.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: Take time to deliberate; but when the time for action arrives, stop thinking and go in.
name: Andrew Jackson

quote: Time flies. It's up to you to be the navigator.
name: Robert Orben

quote: I've always been the type that, every few months, I'm like, 'Let's change the haircut one more time.'
name: Coco Rocha

quote: Time itself comes in drops.
name: William James

quote: Tell the truth, work hard, and come to dinner on time.
name: Gerald R. Ford

quote: Time is the fire in which we burn.
name: Gene Roddenberry

quote: A lot of legends, a lot of people, have come before me. But this is my time.
name: Usain Bolt

quote: Am I complicated? Nah, I'm interesting. I just like having a good time.
name: Gerry Cooney

quote: This is the key to time management - to see the value of every moment.
name: Menachem Mendel Schneerson

quote: Fog is my weakness, and every time there is low fog, I am out and about with my camera.
name: Om Malik

quote: There is a time for many words, and there is also a time for sleep.
name: Homer

quote: I went to a restaurant that serves 'breakfast at any time'. So I ordered French Toast during the Renaissance.
name: Steven Wright

quote: What will I be doing in twenty years' time? I'll be dead, darling! Are you crazy?
name: Freddie Mercury

quote: Each time dawn appears, the mystery is there in its entirety.
name: Rene Daumal

quote: There's no time for regrets. You've just got to keep moving forward.
name: Mike McCready

quote: Truth is the daughter of time, not of authority.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success.
name: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: You can't have a better tomorrow if you are thinking about yesterday all the time.
name: Charles Kettering

quote: I love being outdoors. I love just spending time in the sun and hanging out with my friends.
name: Nina Agdal

quote: The more you do stuff, the better you get at dealing with how you still fail at it a lot of the time.
name: John Mulaney

quote: I think anything is possible if you have the mindset and the will and desire to do it and put the time in.
name: Roger Clemens

quote: I like that time is marked by each sunrise and sunset whether or not you actually see it.
name: Catherine Opie

quote: This is no time for ease and comfort. It is time to dare and endure.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Time to open up a new chapter in life, and to explore a larger centre.
name: Lillian Russell

quote: I love getting dressed up in a suit because I don't do it all the time.
name: Jason Statham

quote: Time flies like an arrow - but fruit flies like a banana.
name: Terry Wogan

quote: I suppose leadership at one time meant muscles; but today it means getting along with people.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change.
name: Thomas Hardy

quote: The time for action is now. It's never too late to do something.
name: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: I have a new philosophy. I'm only going to dread one day at a time.
name: Charles M. Schulz

quote: My ultimate goal is to end up being happy. Most of the time.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: We didn't lose the game; we just ran out of time.
name: Vince Lombardi

quote: Procrastination is the thief of time.
name: Edward Young

quote: Playing video games is something I enjoy in my spare time. I'm a gamer, always have been.
name: Kevin Garnett

quote: If I'm ever having a good time, I'll write about it so I'll remember it.
name: Brantley Gilbert

quote: Youth is the best time to be rich, and the best time to be poor.
name: Euripides

quote: It takes a long time to grow an old friend.
name: John Leonard

quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The time to repair the roof is when the sun is shining.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: There is no right time and right place for love... it can happen any time.
name: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.
name: Dorothea Lange

quote: Right now I'm having amnesia and deja vu at the same time... I think I’ve forgotten this before.
name: Steven Wright

quote: The history of innovation is the story of ideas that seemed dumb at the time.
name: Andy Dunn

quote: I enjoy going to the beach, relaxing with my wife, going out to dinner, and having a good time.
name: Frank Vincent

quote: In order to succeed you must fail, so that you know what not to do the next time.
name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: Loyalty to the Nation all the time, loyalty to the Government when it deserves it.
name: Mark Twain

quote: There are no secrets that time does not reveal.
name: Jean Racine

quote: I try to look cute all the time.
name: Sloane Stephens

quote: I am ready any time. Do not keep me waiting.
name: John Mason Brown

quote: Each time I think I've created time for myself, along comes a throwback to disrupt my private space.
name: Wole Soyinka

quote: Economics is a choice between alternatives all the time. Those are the trade-offs.
name: Paul Samuelson

quote: Weekends are sacred for me. They're the perfect time to relax and spend time with family and friends.
name: Marcus Samuelsson

quote: Mail your packages early so the post office can lose them in time for Christmas.
name: Johnny Carson

quote: Going home and spending time with your family and your real friends keeps you grounded.
name: Jennifer Ellison

quote: We need to internalize this idea of excellence. Not many folks spend a lot of time trying to be excellent.
name: Barack Obama

quote: Our birthdays are feathers in the broad wing of time.
name: Jean Paul

quote: All great achievements require time.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: I find that it's best to take one step at a time and cross each bridge as they come to you.
name: Michael Stuhlbarg

quote: All I want to do when I have time off is to have a laugh with my school friends and go down the pub.
name: Samantha Mumba

quote: I think there's a right time for everything, and I'm a true believer that everything happens for a reason.
name: Bella Hadid

quote: I still spend my time feeling sorry for myself and making serious mistakes.
name: Joe Thomas

quote: The moon puts on an elegant show, different every time in shape, colour and nuance.
name: Arthur Smith

quote: Clock watchers never seem to be having a good time.
name: James Cash Penney

quote: Short as life is, we make it still shorter by the careless waste of time.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: When you are a photographer, you work all the time, because your eye is the first camera.
name: Patrick Demarchelier

quote: My grandmother, she's been the positive portion of my life the entire time.
name: Curtis Jackson

quote: We believe in working hard and having fun at the same time. It's a way of life for me, and I feel tremendous.
name: Robert Stigwood

quote: People who cannot find time for recreation are obliged sooner or later to find time for illness.
name: John Wanamaker

quote: No man goes before his time - unless the boss leaves early.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: I am happy to continue with my journey through time.
name: Mary, Crown Princess of Denmark

quote: Health is the thing that makes you feel that now is the best time of the year.
name: Franklin Pierce Adams

quote: The first time you marry for love, the second for money, and the third for companionship.
name: Jackie Kennedy

quote: It seems like every time you come up something happens to bring you back down.
name: Tupac Shakur

quote: The older we get, the swifter time seems to pass and the quicker memories seem to fade.
name: Brian Sibley

quote: Sometimes a loss is the best thing that can happen. It teaches you what you should have done next time.
name: Snoop Dogg

quote: If time be of all things the most precious, wasting time must be the greatest prodigality.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.
name: Tom Robbins

quote: It's very difficult to take candid portraits of children because they're moving around all the time.
name: Ren Ng

quote: If you're being ignored, that's a good time to concentrate on finding yourself and creating your own mystery.
name: Lykke Li

quote: No trait is more justified than revenge in the right time and place.
name: Meir Kahane

quote: Take time to appreciate employees and they will reciprocate in a thousand ways.
name: Bob Nelson

quote: I respect everybody, but at the same time, I carry myself with an aura that demands respect, too.
name: Lil' Kim

quote: Sometimes you have to accept you can't win all the time.
name: Lionel Messi

quote: If you're not really having a good time, it's not worth it.
name: Kyle Chandler

quote: Being pregnant is supposed to be the happiest time in your life.
name: Kyla Pratt

quote: There's no wrong time to make the right decision.
name: Dalton McGuinty

quote: Take life on life's terms - one day at a time. And have fun while you're doing it.
name: Joe Perry

quote: I live in a crazy time.
name: Anne Frank

quote: Eventually, my eyes were opened, and I really understood nature. I learned to love at the same time.
name: Claude Monet

quote: Although I know it's unfair I reveal myself one mask at a time.
name: Stephen Dunn

quote: A bad system will beat a good person every time.
name: W. Edwards Deming

quote: Life teaches you that you need to make decisions in the right time - not too early, not too late.
name: Jeb Bush

quote: Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.
name: John Lennon

quote: There is no greater harm than that of time wasted.
name: Michelangelo

quote: He who is too busy doing good finds no time to be good.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: If you're doing your best, you won't have any time to worry about failure.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: It takes a long time for a man to look like his portrait.
name: James Whistler

quote: Time flies never to be recalled.
name: Virgil

quote: I don't care how busy I am - I will always make time for what's most important to me.
name: Kevin Hart

quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: Time is the friend of the wonderful company, the enemy of the mediocre.
name: Warren Buffett

quote: I been a long time leaving but I'm going to be a long time gone.
name: Willie Nelson

quote: Truth is the daughter of time, and I feel no shame in being her midwife.
name: Johannes Kepler

quote: But meanwhile time flies; it flies never to be regained.
name: Virgil

quote: It's refreshing to have some time off from wondering whether I look fat.
name: Pamela Druckerman

quote: I remember the first time I had sex - I kept the receipt.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: Punctuality is the virtue of the bored.
name: Evelyn Waugh

quote: The holidays are a rough time for the homeless, but it's a year-round problem we have to solve.
name: Mike Binder

quote: Time is but the shadow of the world upon the background of Eternity.
name: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
name: Bruce Lee

quote: The innocent and the beautiful have no enemy but time.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: Live one day at a time emphasizing ethics rather than rules.
name: Wayne Dyer

quote: The only time people dislike gossip is when you gossip about them.
name: Will Rogers

quote: In the city, we work until quitting time. On the farm, we work until the job is finished.
name: John Bytheway

quote: In my mind I'm a blind man doin' time.
name: Tupac Shakur

quote: I'm very emotional; I think I may go mad in several years' time.
name: Freddie Mercury

quote: Patience and time do more than strength or passion.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: I'm just cruising, doing me, having a good time and focusing on getting better.
name: Alistair Overeem

quote: I prefer peace. But if trouble must come, let it come in my time, so that my children can live in peace.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: As time goes by, you seem to weed out the things that were making your life hard.
name: Tom Petty

quote: I'm the one that has to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life, the way I want to.
name: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Jerry Ford is so dumb he can't fart and chew gum at the same time.
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Every time I watch someone's dedication, I get inspired.
name: Jacqueline Fernandez

quote: Time passes irrevocably.
name: Virgil

quote: Time passes, and little by little everything that we have spoken in falsehood becomes true.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: Autumn's the mellow time.
name: William Allingham

quote: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Time is long but life is short.
name: Stevie Wonder

quote: Nobody gets lucky all the time. Nobody can win all the time. Nobody's a robot. Nobody's perfect.
name: Johnny Weir

quote: We must use time creatively.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Most people spend more time and energy going around problems than in trying to solve them.
name: Henry Ford

quote: If you aim at nothing, you'll hit it every time.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Leadership is inspiring people. Management is keeping the trains running on time.
name: Andy Dunn

quote: It was a confusing time in my life, a really bad day at the office.
name: Boris Becker

quote: The past cannot be cured.
name: Elizabeth I

quote: I learned a long time ago that reality was much weirder than anyone's imagination.
name: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Regardless of who wins, an election should be a time for optimism and fresh approaches.
name: Gary Johnson

quote: The Joker is my favorite villain of all time: You don't know his past; you just know what his plans are.
name: The Weeknd

quote: Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Even if it turns out that time travel is impossible, it is important that we understand why it is impossible.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: Lost time is never found again.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Time well spent results in more money to spend, more money to save, and more time to vacation.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: We must use time as a tool, not as a couch.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: The time was ripe for Flower. The vibe was right.
name: Jody Watley

quote: Old age and the passage of time teach all things.
name: Sophocles

quote: There is nothing as sweet as a comeback, when you are down and out, about to lose, and out of time.
name: Anne Lamott

quote: Nothing is invented and perfected at the same time.
name: John Ray

quote: That brain of mine is something more than merely mortal, as time will show.
name: Ada Lovelace

quote: Time will pass and seasons will come and go.
name: Roy Bean

quote: I wasted time, and now doth time waste me.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: You may delay, but time will not.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I cannot believe in a God who wants to be praised all the time.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Time is not measured by the passing of years but by what one does, what one feels, and what one achieves.
name: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: It took me quite a long time to develop a voice, and now that I have it, I am not going to be silent.
name: Madeleine Albright

quote: The only time I have problems is when I sleep.
name: Tupac Shakur

quote: To be a Negro in this country and to be relatively conscious is to be in a rage almost all the time.
name: James Baldwin

quote: There's a time to impress someone, and then there's a time to make an impression on someone.
name: Cameron Dallas

quote: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Time is but the stream I go a-fishing in.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Even if you don't have time for a big workout, stretching in the morning and night really changes your body.
name: Erin Heatherton

quote: I love my living room: it's the heart of my home where I get to chill and spend time with family and friends.
name: Bobby Berk

quote: You've got to always go back in time if you want to move forward.
name: Snoop Dogg

quote: I think people should look cute all the time.
name: Rachel Zoe

quote: A bad man is the sort who weeps every time he speaks of a good woman.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: In times like these, it helps to recall that there have always been times like these.
name: Paul Harvey

quote: All our sweetest hours fly fastest.
name: Virgil

quote: Time is money.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Nothing is a waste of time if you use the experience wisely.
name: Auguste Rodin

quote: Like as the waves make towards the pebbl'd shore, so do our minutes, hasten to their end.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Time and tide wait for no man.
name: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: Nobody's angry all the time, unless you're a psycho.
name: Brian Azzarello

quote: I love spending time with my dog, my niece and my family. I'm very family-oriented.
name: Lil' Kim

quote: Life is like an ice-cream cone, you have to lick it one day at a time.
name: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Forever is composed of nows.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: That's really one of the things I love about video games. It's a whole new world every time you start.
name: Jennifer Hale

quote: Raising awareness on the most pressing environmental issues of our time is more important than ever.
name: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: If you don't have time to do it right, when will you have time to do it over?
name: John Wooden

quote: Life gives you plenty of time to do whatever you want to do if you stay in the present moment.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: I've been around a long time, and life still has a whole lot of surprises for me.
name: Loretta Lynn

quote: It's always refreshing to step into another time.
name: Diane Lane

quote: Do your damnedest in an ostentatious manner all the time.
name: George S. Patton

quote: I'm thankful for each and every day. We never know when time is up.
name: Chuck Berry

quote: The first time I performed musically, I threw up.
name: Marilyn Manson

quote: Every time I look at you I get a fierce desire to be lonesome.
name: Oscar Levant

quote: We gon' be around for a long time.
name: Quavo

quote: Get the habit of analysis - analysis will in time enable synthesis to become your habit of mind.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Friends are thieves of time.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Comfort food is really anything you want at that time. That said, I really love Naple-style pizza.
name: Geoffrey Zakarian

quote: In the game of 'Survivor,' there is no time for regrets.
name: Jenna Morasca

quote: Time makes more converts than reason.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: I spend time doing cardio because it makes me feel good.
name: Irina Shayk

quote: We must go fast, because the race is against time.
name: Anna Held

quote: Time goes, you say? Ah, no! alas, time stays, we go.
name: Henry Austin Dobson

quote: Time is bunk.
name: Douglas Adams

quote: The time comes upon every public man when it is best for him to keep his lips closed.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The way to deal with the devil of obesity and diabetes is literally one day at a time.
name: Stephen Furst

quote: We are time's subjects, and time bids be gone.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: It's a hard thing to imagine how somebody copes with grief and at the same time has to build a new life.
name: Caitriona Balfe

quote: I think the best riffs and the best songs come when you're jamming and having a good time.
name: Scott Ian

quote: You need to be imagining all the time, imagining yourself outside the walls of your own skull.
name: Anthony Doerr

quote: I put instant coffee in a microwave oven and almost went back in time.
name: Steven Wright

quote: Success consists of getting up just one more time than you fall.
name: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Perfection is attained by slow degrees; it requires the hand of time.
name: Voltaire

quote: You can fool some of the people all the time, and those are the ones you want to concentrate on.
name: George W. Bush

quote: My beautiful son... I can't wait to see his face, hug him, and spend time with him.
name: Jencarlos Canela

quote: But time growing old teaches all things.
name: Aeschylus

quote: In all our deeds, the proper value and respect for time determines success or failure.
name: Malcolm X

quote: I enjoy my fun time and everything like that but I love what I do.
name: Christina Milian

quote: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
name: William Penn

quote: It's the right idea, but not the right time.
name: John Dalton

quote: You just can't be someone else all the time; you just have to be you sometimes.
name: Seth Rollins

quote: It's not about my career now. It's just about finding great work and having a good time.
name: Melanie Griffith

quote: Time is no longer endless or the horizon destitute of hope.
name: Charles Lindbergh

quote: I am happy most of the time.
name: Ronnie Corbett

quote: I hear the theme from 'Psycho' every time I take a shower. I lock the door.
name: Eva Marie Saint

quote: Time is flying never to return.
name: Virgil

quote: When Time is spent, Eternity begins.
name: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: Now is the age of anxiety.
name: W. H. Auden

quote: Everything that has existed, lingers in the Eternity.
name: Agatha Christie

quote: Lose not yourself in a far off time, seize the moment that is thine.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: When in doubt, take more time.
name: John Zimmerman

quote: Time is the wisest counselor of all.
name: Pericles

quote: For time is the longest distance between two places.
name: Tennessee Williams

quote: Time = Life, Therefore, waste your time and waste of your life, or master your time and master your life.
name: Alan Lakein

quote: Time is the father of truth, its mother is our mind.
name: Giordano Bruno

quote: The clock talked loud. I threw it away, it scared me what it talked.
name: Tillie Olsen

quote: I confess, I do not believe in time.
name: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: The past always looks better than it was. It's only pleasant because it isn't here.
name: Finley Peter Dunne

quote: I pass my time in the open air on the beach when it is really heavy weather or when the boats go out fishing.
name: Claude Monet

quote: If you can look into the seeds of time, and say which grain will grow and which will not, speak then unto me.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: I have just got a new theory of eternity.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: There never was a truly great man that was not at the same time truly virtuous.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: In time of difficulties, we must not lose sight of our achievements.
name: Mao Zedong

quote: The time that I have on this earth should just be filled with good times.
name: Kyle Kinane

quote: Flowers are an easy, eloquent expression of love at a time when words can seem clumsy and inadequate.
name: Lynn Coady

quote: Anything I've ever said, I certainly was feeling at the time.
name: Eminem

quote: Time is a circus, always packing up and moving away.
name: Ben Hecht

quote: Everything happens to everybody sooner or later if there is time enough.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Almost every time we get together with family or friends, the conversation ends up being about food.
name: Steve Chen

quote: There's no such thing as quality time; there's only quantity time.
name: Steve Schirripa

quote: So long as you have food in your mouth, you have solved all questions for the time being.
name: Franz Kafka

quote: Time abides long enough for those who make use of it.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: I must govern the clock, not be governed by it.
name: Golda Meir

quote: We have time, there's no big rush.
name: Jimi Hendrix

quote: We have much to learn by studying nature and taking the time to tease out its secrets.
name: David Suzuki

quote: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
name: Theophrastus

quote: When you are insane, you are busy being insane - all the time.
name: Sylvia Plath

quote: There are moments of life that we never forget, which brighten and brighten as time steals away.
name: James Gates Percival

quote: Time brings all things to pass.
name: Aeschylus

quote: A thing is mighty big when time and distance cannot shrink it.
name: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: The trouble with our times is that the future is not what it used to be.
name: Paul Valery

quote: I believe I can even yet remember when I saw the stars for the first time.
name: Max Muller

quote: Every time I see a live performance of something, I'm like, 'I want to be doing that!'
name: Megan Hilty

quote: Work is hard. Distractions are plentiful. And time is short.
name: Adam Hochschild

quote: You'd have to spend a lot of time with me before I'd be comfortable enough to show my dark side.
name: Julianne Moore

quote: Time is the school in which we learn, time is the fire in which we burn.
name: Delmore Schwartz

quote: I want to go ahead of Father Time with a scythe of my own.
name: H. G. Wells

quote: The only thing wrong with immortality is that it tends to go on forever.
name: Herb Caen

quote: Longevity conquers scandal every time.
name: Shelby Foote

quote: Waste your money and you're only out of money, but waste your time and you've lost a part of your life.
name: Michael LeBoeuf

quote: Finding some quiet time in your life, I think, is hugely important.
name: Mariel Hemingway

quote: I visualize a time when we will be to robots what dogs are to humans, and I'm rooting for the machines.
name: Claude Shannon

quote: Perfection is the child of time.
name: Joseph Hall

quote: Hide nothing, for time, which sees all and hears all, exposes all.
name: Sophocles

quote: The time I kill is killing me.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: O sweet, delusive Noon, Which the morning climbs to find, O moment sped too soon, And morning left behind.
name: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: We have not the time to take our time.
name: Eugene Ionesco

quote: Time has a way of demonstrating that the most stubborn are the most intelligent.
name: Yevgeny Yevtushenko

quote: Each moment is perfect and heaven-sent, in that each moment holds the seeds for growth.
name: Suzan-Lori Parks

quote: And when is there time to remember, to sift, to weigh, to estimate, to total?
name: Tillie Olsen

quote: Day, n. A period of twenty-four hours, mostly misspent.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Nothing puzzles me more than the time and space; and yet nothing troubles me less.
name: Charles Lamb

quote: The present is a point just passed.
name: David Russell

quote: Time is what prevents everything from happening at once.
name: John Archibald Wheeler

quote: Who makes quick use of the moment is a genius of prudence.
name: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quote: There's time enough, but none to spare.
name: Charles W. Chesnutt

quote: The best way to fill time is to waste it.
name: Marguerite Duras

quote: Eternity: a moment standing still for ever.
name: James Montgomery

quote: Men talk of killing time, while time quietly kills them.
name: Dion Boucicault

quote: The time to hesitate is through.
name: Robby Krieger

quote: Time, the devourer of all things.
name: Ovid

quote: True time is four-dimensional.
name: Martin Heidegger

quote: The present time has one advantage over every other - it is our own.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Time, whose tooth gnaws away everything else, is powerless against truth.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: Time makes heroes but dissolves celebrities.
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: By the time we've made it, we've had it.
name: Malcolm Forbes

quote: I took some time out for life.
name: James L. Brooks

quote: Time is nature's way of keeping everything from happening at once.
name: John Archibald Wheeler

quote: Time does not change us. It just unfolds us.
name: Max Frisch

quote: The one thing I regret is that I will never have time to read all the books I want to read.
name: Francoise Sagan

quote: It is my feeling that Time ripens all things; with Time all things are revealed; Time is the father of truth.
name: Francois Rabelais

quote: Know how to live the time that is given you.
name: Dario Fo

quote: Well-timed silence is the most commanding expression.
name: Mark Helprin

quote: Let him who would enjoy a good future waste none of his present.
name: Roger Babson

quote: Time is a dressmaker specializing in alterations.
name: Faith Baldwin

quote: Time was God's first creation.
name: Walter Lang

quote: My time is now.
name: John Turner
